item.title: Advent of Code - 2024 Day 8: Resonant Collinearity
item.description:
Introduction

From Advent of Code

This walkthrough explains the solution for calculating antinodes based on a grid of antennas. The problem is inspired by a coding challenge where specific alignment rules govern the calculation of unique grid points called antinodes.

item.title: Python Regular Expressions (re) Tutorial
item.description: Regular expressions (re) in Python are a powerful tool for text processing. This tutorial will guide you through the basics and practical usage of re.
